comment:
/**
 * ---
 * category: utilities
 * ---
 * Decides if the given contrast is sufficient for different text sizes and situations.
 *  for normalText, at least 4.5:1 contrast is required
 *  for largeText, at least 3:1 contrast is required
 *  for graphicsText, at least 3:1 contrast is required
 * @module validateContrast
 * @param {Number} contrast
 * @returns {ValidatedContrasts} validation object
 */
description:
Decides if the given contrast is sufficient for different text sizes and situations.
 for normalText, at least 4.5:1 contrast is required
 for largeText, at least 3:1 contrast is required
 for graphicsText, at least 3:1 contrast is required
name: validateContrast
title: validateContrast
